parameters.definition: The maximum oil capacity in period t
The cost of coal per unit
The cost of nuclear energy per unit
The lifetime of a coal plant
The lifetime of a nuclear plant

description: What is the capacity expansion plan that results in the minimum cost, given the \param{Demand} in period \param{T}, the maximum oil capacity \param{OilCap} in period \param{T}, the \param{CoalCost} per unit, the \param{NukeCost} per unit, the maximum nuclear capacity \param{MaxNuke}, the lifetime of a coal plant \param{CoalLife}, and the lifetime of a nuclear plant \param{NukeLife}?
